title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, October 16, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Oscar Wilde (1854), who once said, “Art is useless because its aim is simply to create a mood.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Oscar Wilde (1854), who once said, “Art is useless because its aim is simply to create a mood.”
